body:
I still kinda noob on this server and i don't know what happend before i joined.
I have seen this called "Avicus ID" in some profiles (ObsidianFire99's profile for example) but i didn't understand what it is. I checked on Wayback Machine if the 'ID' was that but the number there was another (probably a random one, only Ivy knows e_e)
So i want to know:
  1. What's that of Avicus ID?
  2. How can i know what's my Avicus ID?
  3. What's that of ID on McZone profiles?

~Netox

title: Whats dat of Avicus ID?

replies.body:
Your Avicus ID is the order in which you joined the server comparing to everyone else.

Example:
funkystudios ID is 1, because he was the first person to join Avicus.
replies.body_tagged:

Example:

replies.body: I can't find my profile on the wayback machine so i can'r find my ID :(

replies.body: mine was 600 something, I remember killerbyes was 53
replies.body_tagged: mine was 600 something, I remember killerbyes was 53

replies.body: How do I find mine out?
replies.body_tagged: How do I find mine out?

replies.body: So basically I was the 45,082nd person that was on the server (I'm not sure if this applies to MCZone)
replies.body_tagged: So basically I was the 45,082nd person that was on the server (I'm not sure if this applies to MCZone)

replies.body:
Oh nice, i found mine (233565)
You need to go to the old forums (old.avicus.net), login and edit your profile. At the URL of the site it will say old.avicus.net/[YourName]/[YourID]/edit

So yep. Thanks Boss ^>^
